entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with light snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
